Baymont Logo Baymont Inn & Suites is a hotel franchise owned by Wyndham Hotels & Resorts and based in the United States. As of December 31, 2018, it has 513 properties with 40,541 rooms. Source
You can download the Baymont logo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Best Western Hotels and Resorts Logo Best Western International, Inc. owns the Best Western Hotels & Resorts brand, which it licenses to over 4,500 hotels worldwide. The franchise, with its corporate headquarters in Phoenix, Arizona, includes more than 2,000 hotels in North America. The brand was founded by M.K. Guertin in 1946. As of May 2019, David Kong is the president and CEO of Best Western and Dorothy Dowling is the chief marketing officer. Source Source
You can download the Best Western logo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.description: Best Western International, Inc. owns the Best Western Hotels & Resorts brand, which it licenses to over 4,500 hotels worldwide. The franchise, with its corporate headquarters in Phoenix, Arizona, includes more than 2,000 hotels in North America. The brand was founded by M.K. Guertin in 1946. As of May 2019, David Kong is the president and CEO of Best Western and Dorothy Dowling is the chief marketing officer. Source Source

Dolce Hotel & Resorts Logo Dolce Hotels and Resorts’ awe-inspiring locations provide imaginative environments for guests to connect, create, and discover. State-of-the-art meeting spaces with advanced technology paired with Dolce sophisticated food and beverage program, offer an ideal combination for stimulating creativity. Whether it’s an award-winning golf courses, rejuvenating spas, or close proximity to the world’s most famous wineries, guests are drawn to Dolce for meetings, celebrations, and memory-making getaways. Source
You can download the Dolce logo on full-version of the page. ]] >

Hawthorn Logo Stay Hawthorn. Stay as you are. With free WiFi, on-site laundry services, healthy breakfast options and fitness centers, Hawthorn Suites provides everything guests need to stay on track during extended stays. Each spacious suite includes a full kitchen with dishware, glassware and utensils provided. Source
You can download the Hawthorn logo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Howard Johnson Logo
Howard Johnson’s, or Howard Johnson by Wyndham, is an American chain of hotels and motels located primarily throughout the United States and Canada. It had also once been a chain of restaurants for over 90 years and its name was widely known for that alone. Founded by Howard Deering Johnson, it was the largest restaurant chain in the U.S. throughout the 1960s and 1970s, with more than 1,000 combined company-owned and franchised outlets.
You can download the Howard Johnson logo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Howard Johnson
item.description: Howard Johnson’s, or Howard Johnson by Wyndham, is an American chain of hotels and motels located primarily throughout the United States and Canada. It had also once been a chain of restaurants for over 90 years and its name was widely known for that alone. Founded by Howard Deering Johnson, it was the largest restaurant chain in the U.S. throughout the 1960s and 1970s, with more than 1,000 combined company-owned and franchised outlets.

Knights Inn Logo Knights Inn (officially Knights Franchise Systems, Inc.) is a full-limited service hotel chain owned by Red Lion Hotels Corporation and based in Denver, Colorado. Knights Inns used to be built with all-exterior corridors and medieval-inspired architecture, but the chain now has updated options for all Knights Inn properties. Source
You can download the Knights Inn logo on full-version of the page. ]] >

As your ultimate roadside companion, every location also offers free WiFi and a complimentary SuperStart Breakfast to get you recharged and refueled for the day ahead. Source Source

Tryp Logo Powered By The City. Tucked in the heart of the world’s greatest cities, TRYP by Wyndham is on the pulse of local hotspots and must-see sites— from the best restaurants, the coolest spots and the best ways to tap directly into the pulse of whatever city – big or small – you’re exploring. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Wingate Logo
Wingate by Wyndham is a brand of independently owned hotels that targets business travelers. Wingate opened its first hotel in July 1996. Since then, over 100 new Wingate by Wyndhams have been opened. It competes with chains like Hilton Garden Inn, Courtyard by Marriott, and Hyatt Place. Wingate by Wyndham is a part of Wyndham Hotels & Resorts, formerly part of Cendant. In late 2007, Wingate Inn officially changed its name to Wingate by Wyndham.
You can download the Wingate logo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Wingate
item.description: Wingate by Wyndham is a brand of independently owned hotels that targets business travelers. Wingate opened its first hotel in July 1996. Since then, over 100 new Wingate by Wyndhams have been opened. It competes with chains like Hilton Garden Inn, Courtyard by Marriott, and Hyatt Place. Wingate by Wyndham is a part of Wyndham Hotels & Resorts, formerly part of Cendant. In late 2007, Wingate Inn officially changed its name to Wingate by Wyndham.

Worldmark Logo WorldMark by Wyndham (formerly Trendwest) is the developer and marketer of WorldMark, The Club, a vacation ownership program and part of the Wyndham Worldwide Corporation. The original development partner of the Club was Trendwest International (TWI), a subsidiary of Jeld-Wenn Industries, a privately held door and window manufacturer. Source
You can download the Worldmark logo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Worldmark
item.description: WorldMark by Wyndham (formerly Trendwest) is the developer and marketer of WorldMark, The Club, a vacation ownership program and part of the Wyndham Worldwide Corporation. The original development partner of the Club was Trendwest International (TWI), a subsidiary of Jeld-Wenn Industries, a privately held door and window manufacturer. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Wyndham Logo
Simply Comfortable. With locations worldwide, each aspect of a Wyndham hotel or resort is designed with one thing in mind – your comfort. Wyndham enthusiastic staff strives to meet your needs with a warm smile and can-do attitude make sure each and every one has a great stay. From welcoming lobbies, to thoughtfully designed, homey guest rooms with incredible sleep experiences, to well-equipped fitness centers, each space is carefully considered to ensure you feel right at home.
You can download the Wyndham logo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Wyndham
item.description: Simply Comfortable. With locations worldwide, each aspect of a Wyndham hotel or resort is designed with one thing in mind – your comfort. Wyndham enthusiastic staff strives to meet your needs with a warm smile and can-do attitude make sure each and every one has a great stay. From welcoming lobbies, to thoughtfully designed, homey guest rooms with incredible sleep experiences, to well-equipped fitness centers, each space is carefully considered to ensure you feel right at home.

Wyndham Grand Logo Wyndham Grand’s beautiful destinations around the world combine premium amenities, restaurants, and spas with sophisticated architectural design to leave a lasting impression. From little luxuries that surprise and delight to friendly staff who go above and beyond, Wyndham Grand transforms ordinary experiences into unforgettable memories. Source
You can download the Wyndham Grand logo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Conrad Hotels Logo
Conrad Hotels & Resorts is an international brand of luxury hotels and resorts owned and operated by Hilton Worldwide. Conrad was considered the luxury flagship brand in the Hilton Family of Brands, named after company founder Conrad Hilton, until being supplanted by The Waldorf-Astoria Collection in 2006. As of December 31, 2018, it as 33 locations with 10,625 rooms, including two that are owned or leased with 778 rooms, 29 that are managed with 8,874 rooms, and two that are franchised with 973 rooms.
You can download the Conrad Hotels logo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Conrad Hotels
item.description: Conrad Hotels & Resorts is an international brand of luxury hotels and resorts owned and operated by Hilton Worldwide. Conrad was considered the luxury flagship brand in the Hilton Family of Brands, named after company founder Conrad Hilton, until being supplanted by The Waldorf-Astoria Collection in 2006. As of December 31, 2018, it as 33 locations with 10,625 rooms, including two that are owned or leased with 778 rooms, 29 that are managed with 8,874 rooms, and two that are franchised with 973 rooms.

DoubleTree Logo DoubleTree by Hilton is an American hotel chain and a part of Hilton Worldwide. Most DoubleTree hotels are independently owned and operated by franchisees, but some are managed by Hilton Worldwide. Source
You can download the DoubleTree logo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: DoubleTree
item.description: DoubleTree by Hilton is an American hotel chain and a part of Hilton Worldwide. Most DoubleTree hotels are independently owned and operated by franchisees, but some are managed by Hilton Worldwide. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Hilton Logo Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc., formerly Hilton Hotels Corporation, is an American multinational hospitality company that manages and franchises a broad portfolio of hotels and resorts. Founded by Conrad Hilton in May 1919, the corporation is now led by Christopher J. Nassetta. Source
You can download the Hilton logo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Hilton
item.description: Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc., formerly Hilton Hotels Corporation, is an American multinational hospitality company that manages and franchises a broad portfolio of hotels and resorts. Founded by Conrad Hilton in May 1919, the corporation is now led by Christopher J. Nassetta. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Holiday Inn Logo Holiday Inn is a British-owned American brand of hotels, and a subsidiary of InterContinental Hotels Group. Founded as a U.S. motel chain, it has grown to be one of the world’s largest hotel chains, with 1,173 active hotels and over 214,000 bedrooms as of September 30, 2018. The hotel chain’s headquarters are in Denham, Buckinghamshire. Source
You can download the Holiday Inn logo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Holiday Inn
item.description: Holiday Inn is a British-owned American brand of hotels, and a subsidiary of InterContinental Hotels Group. Founded as a U.S. motel chain, it has grown to be one of the world’s largest hotel chains, with 1,173 active hotels and over 214,000 bedrooms as of September 30, 2018. The hotel chain’s headquarters are in Denham, Buckinghamshire. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Hyatt Hotels Corporation Logo Hyatt Hotels Corporation is an American multinational hospitality company that manages and franchises luxury hotels, resorts, and vacation properties. The Hyatt Corporation came into being upon purchase of the Hyatt House, at Los Angeles International Airport, on September 27, 1957. As of March 25, 2018, Hyatt has 777 properties in 54 countries. Fortune magazine ranked Hyatt #186 on its list of “America’s Best Employers” for 2018. Source
You can download the Hyatt logo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Hyatt
item.description: Hyatt Hotels Corporation is an American multinational hospitality company that manages and franchises luxury hotels, resorts, and vacation properties. The Hyatt Corporation came into being upon purchase of the Hyatt House, at Los Angeles International Airport, on September 27, 1957. As of March 25, 2018, Hyatt has 777 properties in 54 countries. Fortune magazine ranked Hyatt #186 on its list of “America’s Best Employers” for 2018. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 MGM Grand Las Vegas Logo
The MGM Grand Las Vegas is a hotel and casino located on the Las Vegas Strip in Paradise, Nevada. The MGM Grand is the largest single hotel in the United States with 6,852 rooms. It is also the third-largest hotel complex in the world by number of rooms and second-largest hotel resort complex in the United States behind the combined The Venetian and The Palazzo. When it opened in 1993, the MGM Grand was the largest hotel complex in the world.
You can download the MGM Grand logo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: MGM Grand
item.description: The MGM Grand Las Vegas is a hotel and casino located on the Las Vegas Strip in Paradise, Nevada. The MGM Grand is the largest single hotel in the United States with 6,852 rooms. It is also the third-largest hotel complex in the world by number of rooms and second-largest hotel resort complex in the United States behind the combined The Venetian and The Palazzo. When it opened in 1993, the MGM Grand was the largest hotel complex in the world.

Sheraton Hotels and Resorts Logo Sheraton Hotels and Resorts is an international hotel chain owned by Marriott International. As of December 31, 2018, Sheraton operates 441 hotels with 155,617 rooms globally, including locations in North America, Africa, Asia Pacific, Central and South America, Europe, the Middle East and the Caribbean. Source
You can download the Sheraton logo on full-version of the page. ]] >
